name: EASTER VORTEX
description:
Easter Vortex is a fun Game  made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 You have one mission  ans that is to get Eggs into the  Hole at the bottom of the vortex. Combat with bunnies to Unveil hidden Eggs, Avoid Surveillance Guns, Once you gotten the Eggs in the Hole, Jump in to Advance to the Next Level

Cheers!
